fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Light Punch: Visit a player. Gain 1 Combo if you're the only visitor. Attack them if you have 3+ Combo.
- [__BEHEMOTH TYPHOON__]: Requires 2 Combo. Swing your coffin at a player, attacking them and the player above them on the playerlist, skipping dead players and yourself. Gain 1 Combo if you kill both targets. 1 night cooldown.
- [__SKYFISH__]: Requires 2 Combo. Tonight, begin revving your gun, informing visitors of the loud noise. Tomorrow night, instead of doing actions you select players equal to your Security Level (ex: 3 Security, select 3 targets). Shoot at each target's house, rampaging there with a basic attack. Reset Security Level to 1 after use. You are roleblock immune during the second part of this ability. Gain 1 Combo if you kill more than 1 player.

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value:
- [__THUNDERBIRD__]: Requires 3 Combo. Send a drone to any player's house, including your own. At the end of each night, see everyone who visits the player's house. At the end of the drone's lifespan, choose a player you saw visit them on any previous night, and powerfully rampage at their house. Gain 1 Combo each night that you see more than 3 visitors. The drone stays on the house for nights equal to your Security Level, then reset Security to Level 1 after use.
- Overdrive (__DOWN WITH THE SYSTEM__): Requires 5 Combo. Deal an Overkill attack to anyone.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Has a unique mechanic called "Security Level". Security starts at Level 1, and is maxed at 3.
- Each night, gain 1 Security.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill the other Fighter, then be the last one standing.
